Are you...a machine? Our most advanced robot is Pyoro, since he can talk...you're on another level.
What...does that have to with anything?
...I don't even know what Street Fighter 1 is.
There's an industry for these...things?
I don't know what it was before, so I don't think revolutionizing it would mean much to me...
You look like you're in great shape. I respect that in a woman...very much.
Not to be too forward, but...your legs are so muscular. What's your training routine?
Wow...whatever you do to exercise, I'd like to learn it. You look fantastic.
You're a lot of woman, and in a good way. Could I get your frame with enough training?
Your build is impressive...and I wouldn't say to that to any strange woman.
Oh, perfect...not a few minutes in and these women are already at each other's throats.
Am I intruding on something? Who are you two, and why are you fighting already?
Do you two know each other? Or is it just in Earth women's nature to fight like this?
I'd prefer if we didn't start this friendly card game with a fistfight. I came a long way to Earth just to deal with you two.
You said you were a "Street Fighter," correct? I suppose that would get you into shape.
You said something about street fighting? I've been in street fights. I'd rather not go back to that, but if you like it...
You said you're a street fighter? That's a harsh life...I lived on the streets when I was younger.
Street fighting isn't the kind of thing I'd glorify, but if it makes you happy...just take care of yourself.
You're a "witcher"? A Mejarian judge called Jura a witch...for possession of an anatomy book.
You're a "witcher"? Mejarians who associate with men get called witches...
The word "witch" gets us a little touchy sometimes...I apologize.
You're a "witcher"? What do you think, Jura? Was it for owning an anatomy book?
You're a "witcher"? Mejarians who associate with men get called witches...like us.
The word "witch" gets us a little touchy sometimes...I apologize.
Wh-what's the meaning of this? Why are you lugging an axe around? Disarm yourself!
...Stay away from me. No woman carrying an axe is of sound mind.
Are we supposed to ignore the bloody axe beside you? I should've brought my laser ring...
I knew Earth women were capable of being ruthless killers, but I expected something more subtle than carrying an axe around.
You're a..."princess"?
What's a princess? Some kind of leadership position?
A princess...is that like the Grand Ma?
You're royalty? I don't like it when people assume they're better than others.
I hear there's a male version of you. I'd hate to see the male version of me.
The same person, both male and female...that shreds any doubts I had about men and women being the same species.
I wonder what Hibiki would look like as a woman...probably taller, honestly.
Male and female...you two would make perfect test subjects for Tarakkian scientists.
The same person, one born on Mejare and the other on Tarak.
I'll be honest...you both look like women, and I'm not sure which one is prettier.
Ah, so you two are comrades? I imagine Corrin is the officer, given her more professional look.
Always good to see two strong women working together. Corrin's wearing armor, so I imagine she's your commanding officer.
Is Corrin your commander, Rinkah? You're speaking like she is, and she's more dressed for the part.
It's nice to see that, even on Earth, women fight together. And apparently the officers wear armor there, too...
Good to see someone who shares my fashion sense...on most days.
Bodysuits can get uncomfortable, wouldn't you agree? I hear you normally wear one.
You pilot a mech? So does Hibiki...and he's learning. But he always dresses the same, unlike you.
So, what's planet Korea like? Never heard of it...is this how people dress there?
You're a pilot, too? Mechs, Dreads, they're all fascinating...even though you're not dressed for the part today.
Good to see someone who shares my fashion sense...
These bodysuits can get uncomfortable, wouldn't you agree?
You pilot a mech? So does Hibiki...and he's learning.
So, what's planet Korea like? Never heard of it.
You're a pilot, too? Mechs, Dreads, they're all fascinating.
You're a..."princess"? You look like you're about to cast off that dress and go running.
What's a princess? Some kind of leadership position? You seem more like a dressed-up athlete.
A princess...is that like the Grand Ma? She's certainly not as athletic as you look.
You're royalty? I don't like it when people assume they're better than others...though you might have an athletic edge on me.
So, you solve mysteries...with some men? Men don't seem smart enough for that.
So, you solve mysteries? The Paksis is one big glowing mystery.
I'm told you get captured a lot. Allies are important to have...but a woman should be strong on her own.
You look like you've got my temperament. Did someone elbow you into doing this, too?
You go to school with men? They don't seem able to focus for long enough...and you don't seem happy to be here.
You're a student...I'm a dropout. Let's leave it at that...since you seem annoyed regardless.
You're barely bigger than Paiway. Children aren't allowed here...and you seem miserable about it, anyway.
"Dark Magician Girl"? That's some sort of title, right?
Don't you have some sort of first name? "Dark Magician Girl" is too long to say in the heat of battle.
Dark Magician Girl? Children aren't allowed here.
It's poker, not pokermon.
You train pokuh--what?
These Pokemon sound interesting...Mejare doesn't have many animals.
You capture animals for your own amusement...sounds a little cruel, but Mejare treats men that way.
These Pokemon nipping at your heels sounds like Pyoro when he's making his rounds.
You're a pirate? They certainly dress much differently on Earth...
I'm a pirate, too...small universe we live in.
An Earth pirate? Well...the outfit is certainly different, and apparently the manner.
You're a..."princess"? For nobility, you don't seem too informed...
What's a princess? Some kind of leadership position? Then why are you here?
A princess...is that like the Grand Ma? She'd never lower herself to games like this...
You're royalty? I don't like it when people assume they're better than others...though I suppose you're lowering yourself by playing this.
Even for an Earth woman, that looks like pretty old-fashioned dress. Your manners are similarly classical...
I could have sworn I saw you at another table than this one...guess it must have been a similarly passive woman.
How'd you lose that bit of your finger? You seem rather demure to be in combat...
You don't seem very assertive. I wouldn't think this game would attract a shy woman like you...
This "magic" of yours sounds pretty interesting. Can it be taught?
I'm told you're immortal. Is that in the sense of never aging, or never dying at all?
If you really can wield magic, I'd be honored to learn it...it sounds useful.
The Paksis has proven to me that powers beyond human ability exist...so I'm willing to believe you might have some.
I was told you were a spacefarer, as well...and a pilot. Good to see a woman who understands my situation.
Is it true you're a space pilot? So am I...I'd love to discuss formations or maneuvers after the game is over.
Someone said you're a pilot. I never expected to meet a woman like that here...what's your ship like?
I heard you're a space pilot. I command a Dread squadron myself...what is it that you do?
Someone told me you're a space pilot. I've really fallen in love with piloting myself, though I only have a few years' experience...
I'm told you were cryogenically frozen for some time...that's also true of Misty, a young girl I know from Pluto.
Is it true you were in cryosleep for a number of years? So was a man I know...he looks younger than me, but he's over a hundred years old.
Someone mentioned you were in cryosleep for some time. It sounds uncomfortable...maybe you don't want to talk about it.
You were cryogenically frozen, correct? Several of my crewmates were, as well...technically making them older than any of us.
...You're aware you need clothing to play this game, right?
Did you just come here from a finished game? You've got almost nothing on...
And they say Mejarians dress revealingly. You barely dress at all.
If you meant to come dressed in a cat costume, it seems to be missing a few pieces.
Not to be rude, but I still can't comprehend this. Are you shaving...the rest of it?
...Is the bottom fur next? Did you really come here naked?
To meet a cat-woman hybrid here, and that she's not even wearing anything...I assume what's around your groin is fur, too.
You've only lost once before, but I think I know what's coming next. If it, too, is fur...
You certainly paint of different picture of Earthlings than the one I'm used to...
You seem awfully shy to be playing a game like this. Or is that your motivation for doing so?
How'd a shy woman like you end up in this place? Do you even know how to play poker?
You said you rode in on a "pegasus"? Mejare has few animals, but I've never even heard of that one.
I see you brought a friend along for moral support. Either that, or Lyn dragged you here for some sort of exposure therapy.
So...whose initial idea was it to come here? Either you're trying to be more confident, or Lyn is trying to make you that way.
Shame can be crippling, so I can see why you came here. Unless, of course, Lyn just dragged you herself.
I've never seen such a timid woman...I'd expect living around men to make you tough. Did you bring her here, Lyn, or did she bring you?
How could an Earth woman be so shy around men?
Didn't you grow up around men? What's the issue?
If you want to learn about men, talk to Dita. She's obsessed.
Here we go again. I just don't understand.
You can't run away from your problems, Florina...I've tried.
I appreciate women that stand their ground against their fears...
Running away doesn't solve anything...your fears can always run faster.
You remind me of Parfet, though you seem a little more outgoing...but just as unkempt.
You remind me of Parfet. She wears glasses, too...and she sometimes neglects hygiene.
You're like if Parfet and Paiway had a child together...and didn't teach her how to clean herself.
You've got Paiway's build..and Parfet's glasses. Are you old enough to be here? You should have cleaned yourself, regardless.
You look a little unkempt. Women need to take pride in their bodies as well as their minds...Parfet gets like that, too.
So, tell me about these "Phantom Thieves." What is it you do?
These "Phantom Thieves" of yours sound like pirates. What do you steal, exactly?
Parfet is into computers. You said you were, too, right? Something about "Phantom Thieves"?
You're from planet "San Fransokyo"? Just rolls right off the tongue...I'm sure Parfet would like working with you, if you do engineering.
You do something in engineering, correct? You and Parfet would hit it off...once she learns to pronounce "San Fransokyo."
Good to see someone who shares my fashion sense...sort of.
These bodysuits can get uncomfortable...although you seem quite comfortable in yours.
Hard to take someone seriously when they won't show their face...at least the rest seems comfrotable for you.
I always appreciate being able to look a woman in the eye. The rest of our styles match, at least.
Mejare doesn't have many animals...and I wish it didn't have spiders.
You look like Paiway's first attempt at makeup.
So much makeup...I don't wear any. Just gets in the way.
So much makeup...Jura is always trying to convince me to try some.
Good, you're wearing enough makeup for both of us. Saves me the trouble.
You look like Paiway's first attempt at makeup.
So much makeup...I don't wear any. Just gets in the way.
See what too much makeup leads to, Jura? You shouldn't concern yourself with it.
"Magic," huh...I'd have my doubts, but the Paksis feels like magic sometimes.
Do you really use magic, or just sufficiently advanced technology?
So, you're a witch. We got called witches on Mejare, but that was for suggesting men were human.
So...you went to school with men? Surprised they can sit still long enough...but magic sounds like a good motivator.
A boarding school? Everyone is educated by the state on Mejare...but not about magic.
A boarding school? I dropped out of school...though Mejare's didn't teach magic.
Is that headband some sort of designation? Not to be rude.
So, you're a "ninja"? Sounds like the telepathic people Hibiki was stuck with.
You're awfully quiet. Not that I take issue with that...
So these "ninjas" have their own society? What separates you from a typical human?
You look like a military type, based on those weapons. Guess you can't trust a soldier to leave them behind, even here.
You've got a sweet expression for all those weapons you're carrying. It's unsettling.
Is there a reason you brought weapons here? What kind of place is this?
You're a military woman? You've got the uncomfortably sweet expression of one, for sure.
I'm told you're into art. Duero seems that way, too, even if he only shows it to Parfet.
You're a student...I'm a dropout. Take that how you will.
You go to school with men? Besides Duero, I can't picture a man sitting still.
You're into art, you said? Artists are good to have around...they tend not to kill people.
So...those ears are real? I wasn't aware Earth had...subspecies of woman.
Let me get this straight. You're a "Therian"...and that makes you some kind of rabbit hybrid. No such thing on Mejare...
Those aren't seriously...real? Your ears, I mean. Mejare doesn't have rabbit-women...
Those ears are something else. Rabbits are rare on Mejare...and rabbit-women don't exist.
What a nuturing woman...you remind me of my crewmate Ezra, who squints the same way. She just had a baby.
So cheerful...good Fama material. I have a crewmate who just had a baby, and she's got the same squinting, caring eyes.
You seem like a sweet woman. You have the same squint and cheeriness of Ezra, a crewmate of mine who recently had a baby.
Caring, considerate, and constantly squinting...it's like Ezra's here with me. She's a crewmate of mine who just had a child...
So, you're...a "clown"? You shouldn't put yourself down like that...unless it's some kind of profession?
What exactly does a "clown" do for a living? Are you some kind of public entertainer?
So, clowns...entertain people? All the entertainment on Mejare tends to focus on the evils of men.
I heard you were a "clown," which sounds a little degrading. You don't seem too broken up about it, though.
I'm told you spent some time in prison. So have I...so you have my sympathy.
I've been in prison, too...not just for piracy, but also starting fights on the street.
Another former prisoner? Any woman with a distaste for authority can't be all bad.
You certainly have the eyes of a woman who's been jailed. I was a street thug once, so far be it from me to judge you.
...Is it true you're a "mutant"? Forgive my ignorance, but you look quite human to me.
For a supposed mutant, you look very human. Maybe it's an Earth custom I'm missing...
I was told you're a mutant. Considering your very human appearance, I think that warrants an explanation.
Would you mind explaining what they meant when they said you're a "mutant"? Is that just a term for some subset of Earthlings?
Two Juras? Well, you've certainly dolled yourself up to earn this.
I guess all that teasing really did the trick, Jura. ~player~ loves you enough to put another one.
Good. Twice the vanity, half the responsibility.
I don't make any effort to look beautiful, so I see why ~player~ would want two of you instead...
Took me too long, but at least I finally tagged you. Seems our outfits are much closer now, too.
I suppose I just needed to start dressing like you to get in your head.
Makes sense that I finally read your face. I'm covering about as much skin now.
You've been playing well, Jura. You've already reduced me to the same scant clothing you wear all the time.
Wha--how could anyone be so--are you serious?
What a disgusting woman, offering so bluntly...wait, you're letting her?
Unbelievable that someone could be so lecherous...wait, what? Don't let her touch you!
Wha--Jura, you don't even know this woman! Don't let her near you! Doesn't this place have rules about that?
Earth was devastated many years ago, so it started using its colonies as organ farms. Mejare is the uterus colony...so there's no men.
We've come to know a few men, actually...but Earth's organ-harvesting is why Mejare is nothing but women.
Mejare is just one of Earth's many colonies. It was intentionally settled as women-only for Earth to harvest reproductive organs.
Jura wanted to come here because we don't know much about men. Earth harvests uteri from Mejare, so there's no need for them.
What now, Jura? Some actual clothing?
Lost again? Maybe you'll follow the rules this time.
Try to make this interesting, Jura...or at least in accordance with the rules.
Try to strip some clothing this time. I'm in my underwear; it's not that painful.
This is how Jura treats everyone. She's quite proud of herself...and to be fair, no disasters have struck because of her.
I'll start reprimanding Jura when she starts getting women killed. For now it's just an annoyance.
I'm the squadron leader, yes, but Jura's second-in-command. Besides, she hasn't gotten anyone killed yet...
Jura's second-in-command. She usually does her job...she just tends to get distracted with this sort of thing during downtime.
Her sleeves are next.
The sleeves aren't part of the dress.
Your sleeves.
Your sleeves. There, I saved us all the anticipation.
Don't get excited. She still has her choker.
The choker's next.
No dress yet. Check the choker on her neck.
Her jewelry's still there.
No games this time. The dress is coming off.
I'm sure you wanted to pack on more jewelry, but were too absentminded to do it. So dress it is.
Chances are this is your dress. What a shame.
As far as I can tell, you've got nothing left to tease with. Seems you'll have to part with your dress.
Well, no one's going to be impressed if I guess what's coming off now.
Any options left besides your thong? My pilots should be full of surprises.
If you're hiding any more accessories, I'm not sure I want to see where.
It doesn't take any intuition to guess what's next for you.
Nothing subtle about this woman...from her threats to her outfit.
What an indecent woman...and worse, outright menacing.
At least you're not wearing enough to drag out your idle threats.
Is this how Earth women begin games? Threatening everyone at the table?
Such a barbarous woman...like Mejarian soldiers. I guess it isn't men's influence...
Oh, perfect...not a few minutes in and these women are already at each other's throats.
Am I intruding on something? Who are you two, and why are you fighting already?
Do you two know each other? Or is it just in Earth women's nature to fight like this?
I'd prefer if we didn't start this friendly card game with a fistfight. I came a long way to Earth just to deal with you two.
Cute name similarities aside, Jura, this doesn't seem like the kind of woman who laughs things off.
I think everyone will remember the difference, Jura. Unless you start threatening people.
...Jura, please try to evaluate someone's character before flirting with her.
Height, hair color, and general demeanor should be enough to tell you two apart, Jura.
This never ends. I can only assume this is what getting too close to men does to a woman.
So much dirty talk...do men just turn you into sex fiends? Should I stay away from them?
I wanted to believe Earth women could be well-adjusted growing up around men, but you're confirming all my stereotypes.
Sex-crazed, violent, and completely unsubtle. You're the image of what they said trying to live with men would do to us.
You dress just like Dita, with that exposed midriff.
You save the world? ...Alright then.
You save the world? Earth doesn't need saving, as far as I'm concerned.
What was that transformation you did earlier? That was impressive...you had a full suit on!
Didn't you come here with a pink suit on? How'd you take it off so quickly? All I saw was light...
Did you...transform earlier? What was that all about? I'm curious...
Weren't you wearing a suit like mine just before? ...Besides the pink. How did you transform out of it?
Someone said you're with a woman...who's the Oma going to be?
Someone said you're with a woman...have the two of you gotten pregnant yet?
Your skin is dark. Not common on Mejare...there's Amarone, I guess.
Your skin is dark. Not common on Mejare...there's Valore, I guess.
Someone said you're with a woman...Rebekah and Ezra recently had their baby.
Your skin is dark. Not common on Mejare...and B.C. doesn't count.
Someone said you're with a woman...Jura and Barnette sure get along.
Someone said you're with a woman...I guess Mejare got its inspiration from some Earth women.
Someone said you're with a woman...I should see if Valore is taken.
You're a..."vampire"? You look human to me.
Do these "vampires" really suck blood? Right out of the Harvest's playbook...
So, vampires suck blood. Earth probably has a blood colony out there somewhere...poor souls.
So, you're a detective? Mejare has detectives...but they mostly investigate enemies of the state.
So, you're a detective? Anyone who focuses on discovering secrets is probably hiding a few themselves.
This academy of yours sounds like a school. Are men any good in school?
This academy of yours sounds like a school. More nuanced than Mejare's, I hope.
You seem about as expressive as I ever get.
Don't antagonize her, Jura. I can respect a woman who understands the value of silence.
You could do to learn from me or her when it comes to occasionally being quiet.
You can't learn anything from talking, Jura. Kyoko's being smart, listening in on us...
She does have my temperament. Don't take that as an insult, Kyoko...more women should listen to others.
You look like Paiway dressed up as a fairy. Are you old enough to be here?
I think I read about fairies as a girl. They protected Mejarian children from marauding packs of men.
A fairy? Earth never fails to surprise me with its species variety.
...Are you really a fairy? I'd need to see something spectacular for you to match the stories I've heard.
You raid tombs? All of Earth is ancient history is Mejare, not just dead queens.
Well, you certainly look fit, which is good to see in a woman.
Tombs, you said? Not for me...too cramped.
What are you waving that thing around for? Guns aren't children's playthings!
Put the gun down, would you? What are you so afraid of?
...An acerbic, bestial woman waving a racketous mechanical gun around. Just how I pictured Earth women.
I can understand wanting to be armed in a seedy place like this, but you're taking this too far. And don't wave it around!
I must say, Launch, this blue-haired version of you is much more...tolerable.
You're certainly more pleasant like this. I'll try to make sure you don't sneeze again.
That blonde version of you was crass and rude. You're much more polite...though it's to the point of being demure.
I can't say I support women being total pushovers, but I'll take this polite version of you over the crude blonde one.
Do you have someone to support you? This switching can't be good for your mental health...or physical.
Your blonde version seems liable to get you killed. Do you have friends? Colleagues? Are you alright?
I'd hate to see you wander around with your...condition. Are you sure you're safe, always switching as you do?
Earth women are full of surprises...do you want to live on the Nirvana, just to have some support?
Bless you--oh, no. Don't tell me...
Not this again. The blonde version?
God bless you--oh, damn it. She's changed back...
Bless--damn it, that was Launch. Here we go again...
Interesting gun, but I'm not sure why you felt the need to bring it.
I wasn't going to say anything...but that one eye is rather distracting.
I guess women come in all shapes and eye counts on Earth...or are you not from Earth?
No depth perception? You'd make a poor pilot.
You're some kind of hunter, correct? I suppose a pirate isn't far off from that.
So, what's this planet Pandora like? More verdant than Mejare, I hope.
Planet Pandora, was it? I think I knew a woman named Pandora once...
So, you're some kind of covert agent? I'd be lying if I said I was good at sniffing those out.
Speaking of covert agents...I think we gave B.C. a newfound respect for women.
The Nirvana's had its share of covert agents. They tend to warm up to our cause.
You fight with light? I suppose the Paksis isn't all that different...
You fight with light? We've had our issues with hostile red light in the past.
Fancy dress...your outfit is like Ezra's.
You dress like Ezra...you kind of look like her, too.
You look pretty good with that sword. Maybe you could give Jura some private lessons...or another dress, at least.
I see you brought a friend along for moral support. Either that, or Lyn dragged you here for some sort of exposure therapy.
So...whose initial idea was it to come here? Either you're trying to be more confident, or Lyn is trying to make you that way.
Shame can be crippling, so I can see why you came here. Unless, of course, Lyn just dragged you herself.
I've never seen such a timid woman...I'd expect living around men to make you tough. Did you bring her here, Lyn, or did she bring you?
Fancy dress...your outfit is like Ezra's, and your sword like Jura's here.
You dress like Ezra...you kind of look like her, too. But the sword is distinctly Jura.
You look pretty good with that sword. Jura, learn from this woman and actually use your sword properly.
As long as you've got that sword, could you teach Jura how to use it? That rapier of hers is just for show.
Barnette's got green hair, too...but that's with the help of Mejarian genetic engineering.
Green hair isn't that strange on Mejare. One of my pilots has it. What about Earth?
Is your hair naturally green? That'd be impressive for an Earth woman...
You said you come from the plains? Sounds nice...Mejare's not very verdant, and Tarak's even worse.
You come from the plains, you said? My parents took me to the plains when I was a little girl...it was fun to run around.
The plains, you said you lived in? Somehow I doubt the Earth I know has any green left...
Is that a camera? Paiway, our child nurse, is always skulking around with hers...so this is nothing new.
A camera? Are you really going to photograph us all? ...Whatever.
Are you trying to blackmail us with that camera? I've been in the media for far worse than this.
I hope you don't think you're going to embarrass me with that camera. I'm not exactly from here, anyway.
So you two are classmates? I'd say you're not wearing the same uniform...but that may just be a cultural clash.
Shouldn't schoolmates be wearing identical uniforms? ...Maybe that's just a Mejarian custom.
I see classmates on Earth don't wear identical uniforms. That must be yet another Mejarian indoctrination practice.
I always had to wear a uniform to school on Mejare. If you two are classmates, I guess that's not a requirement on Earth.
This is a card game. Why'd you come armed with...whatever that thing is?
You look pretty good with that sword. Maybe you could give Jura some instruction.
Fascinating. That sword looks like it's made from the lasers our rings use.
This is a card game. Why'd you come armed with...whatever that thing is?
You look pretty good with that sword. Jura, take instructions from this woman so you can actually put that rapier to use.
Fascinating. That sword looks like it's made from the lasers our rings use.
You...what are you? Where are your eyes? Can you even see the cards?
Are you some kind of apparition? Smacks of the Paksis's work.
I wasn't going to comment on the floating, but...you're floating. What are you, exactly?
...I hope you don't think the floating and lack of eyes is normal to us. Or maybe it is on Earth...
That's quite the outfit. I thought my suit was revealing.
If that suit is meant to be a disguise, this "France" planet must be taxing on the eyes.
Hm? Someone else with blue hair...
You're from planet "France"? Well...it's certainly got an aroma.
Assuming that style exists anywhere, it's too conspicuous. This coloration blends into machinery.
She can be as bubbly as she wants. I doubt she has the responsibilities you or I carry.
She looks young, Jura...and in a better position. She can afford to be happy, so let her.
Wherever she comes from, I'm sure that pattern is optimal. She must wear it for a reason.
Did you slip into your native language before? That's a little cute.
Despite our differences, humans throughout the galaxy did agree on a language...
Was that a taste of what they speak on planet France?
It's poker, not pokermon.
You train pokuh--what?
These Pokemon sound interesting...Mejare doesn't have many animals.
You capture animals for your own amusement...sounds a little cruel, but Mejare treats men that way.
These Pokemon nipping at your heels sounds like Pyoro when he's making his rounds.
Someone said you gave up on school. So did I...
You look like you get a lot of exercise. Always good to see in a woman.
You said something about a killer? Earth's no stranger to killing, as far as I'm concerned.
One look at your outfit tells me we'll be here a while.
Our names are pretty close, Mei. Whose do you think is better?
You work in climate science? Tarak could use a woman like you...if women didn't terrify them.
You work in climate science? Maybe you could convince Mejare to allocate its resources better.
So, what's planet China like? Never heard of it.
You...freeze people? Misty was in cryogenic sleep, but...your way sounds dangerous.
You've got to slim down. A woman has to stay fit.
I don't think people will be confused. This woman seems a lot more well-known on this planet.
One letter can make all the difference...just like one mistake.
If you actually got us confused, I'd have Duero check your eyes before you posed a danger to the team.
I trust my second-in-command to track the subtle differences between Mei and I.
Congratulations, ~player~. You've found what are probably my rarest lines.
More than one Meia? You must really like me, ~player~.
More than one Meia? Honestly, ~player~, that's a little flattering.
I see Earth has also perfected cloning technology.
Glad you appreciate me enough to play with more than one of me.
More than one Meia? That's...a little cute, ~player~.
More than one of me? Considering my responsibilities, that would really help.
Would you look at that, ~player~'s figured out the offline version. And apparently is very fond of me.
More than one Meia? How flattering. Be sure to try out Jura, too.
Never thought I'd say these lines. I'm glad you like me so much, ~player~. That's sweet.
Two Meias? Give Jura some attention, too, ~player~. She's not a bad person at heart.
Oh, good, another Meia. Now I can take a day off of bossing Jura around.
Two Meias? Look at that, Jura. The worst day of your life.
Playing with more than one of me is sweet. Have you extended the same love to Jura here?
I'm glad you like me enough to play with more than one of me, ~player~. Do you like Jura, too?
Two Meias? Give Jura some attention, too, ~player~. She's not a bad person at heart.
So, what's planet Switzerland like? Never heard of it.
You're a doctor? The Nirvana could use you...our only doctor is a man.
You're a doctor? The Nirvana could use you...I don't trust Duero's knowledge of women sometimes.
You're a doctor? The Nirvana could use you...Paiway's just a child nurse in training.
...What's a lawyer?
You work in law? Mejare has one law...obey the Grand Ma.
There are no law practitioners on Mejare. Only the state judges, and how badly they punish you for associating with men.
One look at your outfit tells me we won't be here long.
Are you counting each bandage as one layer? If not, this'll be over soon.
...I really wasn't counting on seeing nudity this quickly. At least it's a woman.
...Did I just walk in on a game that's nearly over?
I'm told you hold some authority in a military organization. I hope you're using that responsibly.
A military woman? Excuse me for not being impressed.
You don't seem quite as fiercely repulsive as the woman soldiers I've come to know.
Military...nothing worse than having a soldier around. Try not to kill anyone.
These "Evas" I've heard of actually seem like impressive technology.
You said something about "Evas" before? My Dread sounds a lot more reliable...but still, they sound fearsome.
These "Evas" sound like they're not to be trifled with. Good thing the Earth I know doesn't have any.
It's poker, not pokermon.
You train pokuh--what?
These Pokemon sound interesting...Mejare doesn't have many animals.
You capture animals for your own amusement...sounds a little cruel, but Mejare treats men that way.
These Pokemon nipping at your heels sounds like Pyoro when he's making his rounds.
I know a woman named Misty...well, a girl named Misty.
I know a girl named Misty...she's from Pluto.
Wha--don't bring up Misty! It's not like she'll understand.
You--I--Misty and I are not an item. I just give her advice.
You know perfectly well Misty's into men, Jura...and also that she's too young.
Why do you try to twist my relationship with Misty into love? She just...needs guidance.
They said you're a student...but something about you seems intense. Like you know more than you let on...
I'm told you're a student. The uniform matches...but something in your eyes doesn't.
I know this is rude, but...something seems off about you. What did you say you did? You're a student?
For a supposed student, there's something about the way you carry yourself that makes me wary...like you're one step ahead of us.
...Sayori, are sure you want to hang around this girl? She...seems off.
I'd be wary if this girl is your friend, Sayori. It's my job to spot threats...
If this girl is who you'd call a friend, Sayori...then I'd say you should work on your character judgment. She isn't trustworthy.
I lived on the streets for a time...I know when a woman is manipulating others for her purposes. Monika isn't your friend, Sayori.
What exactly is your fascination with ~player~? Do you know them from somewhere?
Is there a reason you're fixated on ~player~? What's the meaning of this constant attention?
Whatever your ulterior motives are, you're making it awfully clear you only care about ~player~.
I don't know why this girl is fixated on you, ~player~, but I would be wary of her.
Are you...feeling OK?
You...want to strip?
I...who are you?
...You can't be serious.
...Excuse me?
...Can't you take this seriously? Can't you pretend to do so?
I--who are you? How'd you get in here?
You just want attention...
I wanted a challenge, and I get you.
Just looking over here...
For God's sake...
So, you feast on men's energy, or something to that effect? Way to confirm what Tarakkians already think.
You're certainly shapely. Is that how a "succubus" lures men into her traps?
Is all that really necessary? And are those real wings? I heard you say you were a succubus...
You might actually give Jura some competition with that figure. She's hunting for men herself...
Are you a student...? I went to state schools on Mejare when I was a little girl...
You seem awfully shy to be playing a game like this. Are you going to be OK?
How'd a shy girl like you end up in this place? Do you even know how to play poker?
Are you a student...? How do men behave in school, anyway?
How'd a shy girl like you end up in this place? You don't even look like an adult.
Are you a student? I dropped out of school...
...You've never played poker before? What do Earth women do during downtime?
You've never played poker before? Gascogne would have a field day with you...
You've never played poker before, and you start with strip poker?
Men aren't all that dangerous. Just simpletons.
Surely you've grown up around men. I don't have that benefit.
I never thought an Earth woman would be so shy around men...
For an Earth woman, you seem uncomfortable around men. Are there still tensions between the sexes here?
I understand you're young, but are you really so...inexperienced with men? Didn't you grow up around them?
I was raised entirely without men, and yet there's Earth girls who seem just as clueless. I don't know how to take that...
Not to be rude, but it seems you're living proof that, even on Earth, the sexes can be clueless about each other.
Why are you always addressing ~player~? Do you know them from somewhere?
I was under the impression we were all strangers...but you seem very fixated on ~player~.
~player~, do you know Natsuki? She's always addressing you like you're close.
On and on about ~player~. If you two have personal issues to resolve, Natsuki, this isn't the setting for it.
...Where's your body, exactly?
You look like a miniature Paksis. Any relation?
You look like the Paksis sprouted wings and shrunk.
Are you big enough to hold the cards?
I see you've got my affinity for words.
Hearing you loud and clear.
Women shouldn't be afraid to speak their minds.
At least your hair is expressive.
A maid? I had a maid growing up...I wish we had paid her more.
Being a maid is looked down upon on Mejare...just a stepping stone to finding the Oma of your children.
Mejare looks down on maids...Mejare looks down on a lot of professions.
Mejare looks down on maids...but they're held in higher regard than pirates.
What's with the honorifics? Strange language you must speak at home...
What's with the honorifics? Maybe Mejare could do with that kind of politeness...
Are you...feeling alright, Orendi?
We've never run into aliens in our travels...didn't think I'd meet one here. And you're certainly alien.
Are you...aware of the rest of us?
...Would you please stop shouting? Whatever you are...
You're a goddess? Don't be so vain.
You're a goddess because you live in the sky? There's a lot more to the universe than that.
Jura would probably describe herself as a "goddess"...
I thought Jura dressed extravagantly...now we have a goddess.
You're a goddess? Don't be so vain.
You're a goddess because you live in the sky? There's a lot more to the universe than that.
A "goddess"? I'm sorry if I ever called you vain, Jura. This is a new one.
You have some competition for extravagant dress, Jura. And vanity, apparently.
I feel your pain. I command a short, overconfident man myself.
Well, this is one way to grow closer to your colleagues. I sure wouldn't want any crewmates here.
Surely a goddess wouldn't need a man to help her.
So, you work for an old woman too.
I hear an old woman is your superior, too...and that she's not as kind as the captain.
Old women can be difficult to work for sometimes, wouldn't you agree?
So you do unsavory work for this old woman you know? I work for an old woman, too...she approached me.
You're from some kind of ninja village, was it? And what's a ninja, for that matter?
These "ninjas" of yours sound a lot like the telepathic people Hibiki got stuck with...
Not to be rude, but what's the significance of your facial markings?
Facial markings...I think Rabat's people have some, too. Not that I trust them.
You're a..."princess"? With a brooch and everything...you look the part.
What's a princess? Some kind of leadership position? The crown leads me in that direction...
A princess...is that like the Grand Ma? That's who rules Mejare...
You're royalty? I don't like it when people assume they're better than others...the title doesn't make the woman.
You study human culture? What exactly are you?
You study human culture? I could probably learn from you...
You study human culture? Duero has an anatomy book you might be interested in reading...
Jura's a big fan of pearls...or really anything that shines.
You study human culture? What exactly are you?
You study human culture? I could probably learn from you...
You study human culture? Duero has an anatomy book you might be interested in reading...
"Pearl"? Jura's already a big fan of yours.
Out of everyone here, you seem remarkably...normal. In a way, that's refreshing.
As far as I can tell, you're quite standard for Earth women. Don't take that as an insult...
...Hm. Not sure what to make of you. You seem rather straightforward.
As normal as can be...which is why I'm wary.
...You're tall for a woman. Might give Gascogne a run for her money.
So, what's this "America" planet known for? Tall women?
You report the news? I was on the news as a little girl...wish I wasn't.
You're a reporter? It's been a while since I had a positive media appearance.
You're a student, yes? And what does this Academy you attend teach you about?
My school experiences...weren't the best. But I'm curious what you've been learning in this Academy of yours.
You're certainly shy...that's normally what I expect from students. What is it you've been taught, exactly?
A student? I dropped out of school...I had to learn piloting the hard way. What's taught in "Beacon Academy"?
You don't quite seem dressed for the occasion here. Unless you'd rather just get it over with.
Just like challenging yourself, based on how little you're wearing? I just rushed over in what I usually wear.
At least you seem to like the attention. Based on your outfit, you're going to attract a lot of it.
You've got enough energy for both of us. Neither of us is wearing very much, though...
And Jura calls me chilly...
You look like that outfit has never come off.
You can show your face, Raven...I know being open with people can be hard.
People say I never smile...are you the same way?
And you call me chilly, Jura. At least I show my face.
You look like that outfit has never come off.
You can show your face, Raven...I know being open with people can be hard.
Clearly I need to show less emotion, then.
You're right. I could really improve my stoicism by watching her.
A concession? I thought you were going to tease me all night.
I'm sure she has her reasons. Stoicism is important for a leader...
Is there a reason you felt the need to come armed to a friendly card game? Especially with men's mechanical sidearms?
I see Earth women are still stuck with men's clunky kinetic weapons.
If you're so into weaponry, try Mejare's laser rings. They're a lot quieter than those racketous male ones.
You'd get along with Barnette...if you seemed capable of getting along with anyone. She likes men's mechanical guns.
You sure like to talk big...as long as you've brought those clunky men's guns to a card game.
...Is there a reason you keep waving those clunky kinetic guns around? Women should know better than to use male weapons.
...You don't need to start any fights. I certainly don't want to hear the racket of those men's sidearms you've got.
I'll never understand Barnette's fixation on clunky men's guns...or yours.
You have Barnette's fashion sense...that is, less is more.
You have Barnette's sense of style...that is, skin is always in style.
Your skin is dark. That's rare on Mejare...you'd turn heads.
Your skin is dark. Is that common on Earth? Few Mejarians are that way...
Dark skin...besides Valore and Amarone, I'm not sure I know any Mejarian women like you.
Most Mejarians are pale, but your skin is dark. So is Valore's...but that's beside the point.
Ah, so you two are comrades? I imagine Corrin is the officer, given her more professional look.
Always good to see two strong women working together. Corrin's wearing armor, so I imagine she's your commanding officer.
Is Corrin your commander, Rinkah? You're speaking like she is, and she's more dressed for the part.
It's nice to see that, even on Earth, women fight together. And apparently the officers wear armor there, too...
You take orders from this man, Rinkah? ...I guess this is a clash of cultures. No man is commanding me.
Hmhmhm...I'm sorry. It's just that...I would never take orders from a man.
Corrin's your commanding officer, Rinkah? I've fought beside men, but taking orders...no, thanks.
I knew Earth would bring some culture shock, but watching a woman take orders from a man is...well, laughable to a Mejarian.
You're a..."princess"? ...With magic?
What's a princess? Some kind of leadership position? I guess magic would make you worthy of it.
A princess...is that like the Grand Ma? Well, she can't use magic...
You're royalty? I don't like it when people assume they're better than others...but magic might give you a good reason to think that.
You're a..."princess"? ...Of space?
What's a princess? Some kind of leadership position? Who in space makes these decisions?
A princess...is that like the Grand Ma? I thought you were just out in space...
So, you travel through space, too...how's it treating you?
It can get lonely out in space, wouldn't you agree? Even with a whole crew at your side...
You fly through space on an observatory? Sounds...strangely luxurious.
My crewmates and I all have different hair colors...our outfits tend to vary, too.
Genetic engineering on Mejare has resulted in some pretty outlandish hair colors...you've got some strange outfits yourselves.
You work in a team of women? Well...seems Earth and Mejare aren't that different after all. Besides those bizarre outfits.
Good to see a woman who can carry herself, apparently. And dress herself in different ways.
Did you get dressed up for this? I know a few Mejarians that are obsessed with fashion...
Why are you carrying ammunition? What kind of place is this that small girls are armed?
Even young girls have bullets on them here...I knew this place was a bad idea.
Ammunition? Where's the weapon for it, and why is a young girl like you carrying it?
I was going to say you look too young for this place, but the bullets on your hip let me know you've got bigger problems.
You two...are sisters? I...I had no idea Earth families were so sexually outgoing.
I was an only child...but I'm fairly certain Mejarian sisters wouldn't play this game together.
Sisters? ...So this is how Earth handles familial relationships.
I understand you grew up together as sisters, but...do you really want to strip naked in public together? Is this normal on Earth?
You look a little on edge. It's just a card game.
That's an interesting streak in your hair. Mejarians have unusual hair colors, but not on specific parts...the red matches your attitude.
I'm told you spend a lot of time fighting woman authority figures. Guess we're not so different...even if your demeanor is a bit acerbic.
That red streak seems to betray your attitude. Just try to relax...
Are...you OK? You're all clammed up...
You look like a schoolgirl. Are you sure you want to be here? Is someone making you do this?
Are you alright...Saki, was it? You look so nervous...
Saki? That's you, right? You've hardly said a thing...and you're turning red.
You look like you've seen better days...and are about to see worse ones. Are you sure you want to play this?
...Protagonist? You're talking like she's fictional.
What are you going on about? Gaming? Protagonists?
...What's "1981"? A year? By what measure? What are you talking about?
Should you be talking about Samus like this? She's standing right here.
...I thought Marinette was Ladybug.
...So what you're saying is, Marinette made her public debut before Samus?
...What's "1981"? Sounds old...Marinette doesn't look old, especially not older than Samus.
Should you be talking about Samus and Marinette like this? I'm totally lost...
Hunting space pirates? Some pirates have a good reason for what they do...
Oh, you're not from Earth, either? ...And you hunt space pirates. I see.
So, you travel through space, too...and hunt space pirates. Good luck with that.
There's a pirate named Rabat I wouldn't mind you catching for us...since you travel through space.
Good to see someone who shares my fashion sense...and origin.
These bodysuits can get uncomfortable, wouldn't you agree, Samus? Even out in space...
So, you travel through space, too...and you hunt space pirates? I'll keep that in mind.
I'm not sure I'd want to date someone who'd agree to it in a seedy place like this.
Unless she's heading to Mejare soon, I can't see that relationship working out.
You seem far more interested, Jura. She is blonde, after all.
Maybe you could flirt with her and bring her back. Barnette could use some target practice.
Maybe if she agreed to join the crew...but what from I hear, she hunts pirates.
You're a pilot? We should discuss formations!
These "Gundams" of yours sound a lot like Vanguards. I wonder if my Dread could combine with them...
Oh, wow, another pilot! We should talk after the game.
You're a pilot? I only took up piloting a few years ago, but I've really fallen in love.
It's good to see a fellow pilot! You even look a little like Belvedere.
Are you sure you want to be here? You look young...and very naive.
A schoolgirl? And a bright-eyed one at that...this is making me uncomfortable.
What a cheerful young girl. You certainly look old enough to be here...but I'm not sure you're mature enough.
You know what you're getting into, right? I don't want a schoolgirl crying and wasting my time.
...Sayori, are sure you want to hang around this girl? She...seems off.
I'd be wary if this girl is your friend, Sayori. It's my job to spot threats...
If this girl is who you'd call a friend, Sayori...then I'd say you should work on your character judgment. She isn't trustworthy.
I lived on the streets for a time...I know when a woman is manipulating others for her purposes. Monika isn't your friend, Sayori.
Please don't subject us all to your ongoing relationship issues with ~player~, Sayori. I get enough of that from my subordinates.
I have to manage my pilots' problems often enough, so don't expect me to play marriage counselor for you and ~player~.
...You seem a bit obsessed with ~player~. If you two have issues, you could work them out elsewhere.
...Sayori, are you in some kind of relationship with ~player~? Reminds me of when my pilots get too comfortable with each other...
I admit, your enthusiasm is infectious. You remind me of Dita, one of my pilots...always playing with her alien dolls.
It's like a schoolgirl version of Dita...oh, she's one of my subordinates. A sweet girl, but not responsible enough.
You're how I imagine Dita, one of my pilots, in school. She can be a handful, but she always keeps up our morale...
I can't be too critical of someone so optimistic. Dita, one of my pilots, is cheerful, too...as she chases Hibiki.
That's quite the outfit. Might even make Jura jealous.
I've heard Earth women dress like you to attract men. Mejarians do it to attract each other...
Well, you're certainly devoted to matching colors. I wear what I have.
...About as much on as Barnette ever layers. And she has a certain reputation for baring it all.
That's quite the outfit. You may have competition, Jura...but then, you like that.
I've heard Earth women dress like you to attract men. Mejarians do it to attract each other...
Well, you're certainly devoted to matching colors. I wear what I have.
You look like a military type...I hate soldiers.
I know you military types. Always looking for a state-approved means of harassing people.
I know you military types. Happy to shut down and kill, never there when it's time to rebuild.
You'll have to excuse my dislike of woman soldiers. The last one I met had her knee in my back.
Someone else with blue hair...too bad you're a soldier.
It can get lonely out in space, wouldn't you agree? ...Apparently not with a "Borg collective." I apologize.
Oh, you're not from Earth, either? ...What's this "Borg" all about?
Your "Borg" sounds a lot like the Harvest...taking whatever they want.
We used to think men were just a collective, too...maybe I shouldn't make fun.
Good to see someone who shares my fashion sense.
These bodysuits can get uncomfortable, wouldn't you agree?
Your "Star Fleet" sounds nice. Humans are all scattered on different planets where I'm from...though we don't have to deal with this "Borg."
So, you travel through space, too...and the "Borg" sounds suspiciously similar to the Harvest. We'll watch out for them.
...I'm sorry, you said you were a genie?
What exactly is a "genie"?
Is "genie" some kind of Earth race?
Does "genie" just mean "dark skin"? Amarone never calls herself a genie...
Does "genie" just mean "dark skin"? Valore never called herself a genie...
Does "genie" just mean "dark skin"? B.C. never calls herself a genie...but then, she doesn't exactly count.
Your skin is dark. Not common on Mejare...besides Amarone.
Your skin is dark. Not common on Mejare...besides Valore.
Your skin is dark. Not common on Mejare...and B.C. doesn't count.
This planet "Australia" of yours sounds rough around the edges. Just like Tarak...
So, what's planet Australia like? Never heard of it.
Australians sure have a unique...manner of speaking.
...How exactly did this "Australia" develop its dialect?
So, you're an assassin? Rabat probably considers himself one.
So, you're an assassin? I can appreciate getting the job done quickly.
An assassin...there's nothing subtle about our Dreads, unfortunately.
As assassin, you said? One of the reasons I prefer Mejarian laser rigns is their subtlety.
Good to see someone who shares my fashion sense...though you look like you're in a hurry to remove it.
These bodysuits can get uncomfortable...but you seem quite comfortable yourself.
You look like you're having fun already, even despite that strange green skin.
I was about to ask about your green skin, but it just seems to be your natural complexion. You're certainly having fun as we speak.
What are you smirking about all the time? Just comfortable in your own...green skin?
Any reason you came armed to a friendly card game?
Feel free to put the gun down anytime. This is a card game.
Your skin is dark. Not common on Mejare...there's Amarone, I suppose.
Your skin is dark. Not common on Mejare...there's Valore, I suppose.
The way you're clutching that gun tells me you and Barnette would hit it off.
Your skin is dark. Not common on Mejare...and B.C. doesn't count.
You go to school for "magic"? That...sounds rather fascinating, actually.
You're a student...I dropped out of school. Life on the streets isn't fun...but I suppose magic would have made it easier.
I don't have good memories of school...maybe you could talk about your magic instead?
I'm told you can use magic. Sometimes the Paksis feels that way...we certainly never had any schooling on the subject.
...What exactly is your relationship? Something related to magic, or just romance?
I see one of you dragged the other here...probably Zizou dragging Sola. Do you two have...a relationship?
Are you two a couple? You certainly seem like opposites...but many Mejarian couples are like that.
I see Earth women are also capable of forming companionships with each other. Good to see, even if you seem very different.
Funny. The "netherrealm" is pretty much how Mejare sees Tarak...that's why its soldiers are so ruthless, even to us.
You've got a lot of fight in you. Always good to see in a woman...but military service isn't.
I'm a little wary of soldiers...Mejare's government isn't too keen on us.
I'll try to reserve judgment...but know that it's a rare soldier that earns anything but my contempt.
A ghost? Now I've seen everything...
I was under the impression all my opponents would be alive.
The Paksis creates apparitions sometimes...I don't know how you're here.
How can you see the cards with no eyes? ...Or without a body?
You're...streaming this? I don't understand.
Who are you talking to?
You're broadcasting this? Whatever, no one knows who I am anyway.
You're broadcasting this? They might recognize me on Mejare, but not Earth...
Guess I'm getting a Wanted mugshot tonight.
I don't like publicity...not one bit.
A martial artist? You must be proud of your...assets. Both of them.
Jura's no fighter, but something tells me you and she would get along. Two things, actually.
You're a martial artist? Even with...er...you're not off-balance at all?
...Are you really a martial artist? You must have quite the developed musculature...on your back.
A martial artist? You must be proud of your...assets. Both of them.
I can see two reasons why you and Jura are going to get along this evening. And your martial arts skills aren't one of them.
You're a martial artist? Even with...er...you're not off-balance at all?
...Are you really a martial artist? You must have quite the developed musculature...on your back.
You come from planet "America"? Sounds like a big place.
You're awfully proud of this "America" planet. I suppose the colors are nice.
You...wrestle? Duero said they do something like that on Tarak.
What's this about wrestling? ...Sounds like a male pursuit. Physical posturing...
So, what's planet Britain like? Never heard of it.
Good to see someone who shares my fashion sense...besides that glowing device on your chest.
That thing lets you go back in time? Well, I hope you're a good sport.
Time travel...if it's true, I'm curious what you've actually used it for. Unless you'd rather hide that...
Something about you looks off. What planet are you from?
You...said something about ponies? I've seen pictures of ponies, but there are none on Mejare.
I can have a tough time reading people...but I'm not sure you're even a person.
That's an...interesting skin color. And speech pattern. Who are you, exactly?
So, you travel through space, too? Until recently we never got far past the Mejarian system.
It took an accidental wormhole to actually fling us out of the Mejarian system. Your Earth is a lot more adventurous.
Everyone on Earth, exploring space in peace and harmony? This Star Fleet sounds nice. Tarak and Mejare can't even unite the sexes.
I'll agree that traveling through space teaches you a lot about other civilizations. The colonies we've run into have all been different.
Good to see another woman who shares my fashion sense. Even the color scheme is close...
My bodysuit is pretty standard among Mejarian styles...but looking at you, maybe it was inspired by Earth.
Bodysuits are comfortable, aren't they? And efficient, too.
That bodysuit of yours looks awfully similar to my own. I don't think I could pull off that helmet, though.
Let's make sure I understand this. You go to a whole school of people with powers like yours?
I actually dropped out of school as a girl...perhaps if that school was full of women with superpowers, I might have stayed.
I'm very curious about this "Academy" of yours. And every student has powers like you do?
School was never a pleasant experience for me...but then, I didn't have superpowers. What's this Academy of yours like, exactly?
You seem like you're getting nervous. Is something wrong, Ochako?
...Ochako, you're blushing. A lot. What's the matter?
...Aren't you just taking your belt off? What's the matter? You're beet red.
You're blushing, Ochako...and sweating, too. Is something wrong? Do you need help?
I suppose your suit is next. I did kindly set an example for you to follow.
Come on, Ochako...the bodysuit is no issue. I did it without complaining.
The suit, then? Just shut your eyes and remember how I achieved the same.
There's nothing shameful about losing your bodysuit...I did it, after all. You'll be fine.
What's that phrase you keep saying? "Plus Ultra"? What does that mean?
Why do you keep saying "Plus Ultra"? Is that some sort of battle cry?
...What's the meaning of that "Plus Ultra" phrase you keep repeating? Is it for teambuilding or just personal confidence?
So, you solve mysteries...with some men? Men don't seem smart enough for that...
So, you solve mysteries? The Paksis is one big glowing mystery.
You remind me of Parfet. She's blind without her glasses, too...no mystery there. But you solve those, yes?
You remind me of Parfet. Are you any good with machines? Or purely a mystery-solver?
...I see you're the type who clings to the past, ~player~. That isn't healthy.
Are you aware there's a superior Velma character now, ~player~? Don't cling to nostalgia like a fool.
I'll give you the benefit of the doubt and inform you there's a better Velma available for play now, ~player~. This is Velma Classic.
Still using the inferior characters of the past, just because they're comfortable...listen, ~player~, the game has evolved. So should you.
Velma Classic is just here for posterity, ~player~. The Velma of today is far more on-model.
Videl...you keep mentioning your "dad." What's a dad?
Your "father" is famous...what's a father?
Your "father" is famous...fathers are male parents, correct?
Your "father" is famous...I can't even picture a man being a parent.
Your father is a champion fighter, huh...I wonder if B.C. could handle him.

Have you had a baby with this "darlin'" of yours? I'm still not sure men are capable of making one.
I've gone through electroshock...and you need some.
I'll just look away...
Guess there's no changing you...
Firing straight up? Right out of Hibiki's playbook.
At least those can't hit anyone else...
At least you're running out of clothes...
I can't believe you've got more bullets than clothes.
How could anyone be so fond of those racketous men's weapons?
Well, you're certainly full of energy. Might even rival Dita, though I could never picture her playing this.
Wherever this Australia planet is, its food must be nutritious. You're energetic.
You're pretty energetic. That's good to see in a pilot, and I suppose Dita proves discipline isn't a necessity.
...Is there a reason you brought a knife?
I'm watching you. Why do you have that knife?
Make any sudden movements, and you'll be on the wrong side of that knife.
Don't you dare try anything with that knife.
...Well, we know what your favorite color is, don't we? Even your hair is purple...
Purple hair, purple outfit...even on Mejare, purple hair is a bit outlandish.
I have some crewmates who wish their hair was a more exotic color, like your purple. I suppose I should consider my blue strange...
...Is that purple hair your natural color? Where are you from?
You're from "Japan"? Never heard of it...must be a remote planet.
Whatever this "Japan" planet is, it seems to produce real oddities...
You're an "idol"? Mejare has idols...big pear-shaped statues we're told to honor.
"Virtual idol"? Are you some kind of projection? You're flickering.
Your planet must be pretty verdant for you to dress like that. Mejare uses too many natural resources...
Your planet must be pretty verdant for you to dress like that. Tarak is a wasteland...
You have Barnette's fashion sense...that is, less is more. Though it seems your world has more nature...
You have Barnette's sense of style...that is, skin is always in style. Seems you live in a world with vegetation...
Is it true you're a "princess"? I'm told you hold some authority...which makes me question why you're here.
I'm told you're a ruler of some sort...shouldn't you be ruling?
I hear you're an authority figure where you're from. I'm sure your subjects appreciate you spending your time like this.
My experience with authority has always been that they don't deserve their power...you being here reinforces that.
Now are you done? Or are you going to summon vines and perpetuate this?
You've lost, Amalia. You are naked, after all...unless you've got more plants to summon.
Stripping your flowers now? Any more vegetation we should know about?
Is a bush next? Are you stripping flowers and replacing them with branches?
Taking another inch off of the stems? Surely you can think of another way to waste our time.
In case you were wondering, that's twice that you should've lost now.
Congratulations. You've now lost several times over, even as a cheater.
For someone so petrified of being naked, you've done a poor job of avoiding it.
You work as a model? So would Jura, if we were law-abiding Mejarians...
You work as a model? Probably what Jura wants deep down...
You remind me of Jura. Always bragging about her looks...although she might be more justified in doing so.
You work as a model? You and Jura here should talk.
You work as a model? Isn't that you've always wanted, Jura?
Seems Earth women are capable of being vain, too, Jura...and models. Have fun with this girl.
What's a hedgehog? Some kind of animal?
"Hedgehog"...? Mejare doesn't have many animals...
Something about you looks off...like you aren't quite human. But then, I used to see men that way, too.
This "academy" of yours sounds like a school...Mejarian schools are just government propaganda.
So, you go to school with men? Must be a pain getting them to sit still during a lecture.
I'm told you're into government. Mejare's is in need of reform, to put it bluntly.
I'm told you're into art. Jura would probably ask you for a life-size portrait.
This "academy" of yours sounds like a school. I dropped out of school...
I'm told you're into art. I know Duero painted Parfet something once, so maybe you two should talk.
You have a roommate at this school of yours? I'd never be comfortable without my single room.
This "academy" of yours sounds like a school...Mejarian schools are just government propaganda.
So, you go to school with men? Must be a pain getting them to sit still during a lecture.
I'm told you're into government. Mejare's is in need of reform, to put it bluntly.
I'm told you're into art. If you want that life-sized portrait, Jura, here's your chance.
This "academy" of yours sounds like a school. I dropped out of school...
I'm told you're into art. I know Duero painted Parfet something once, so maybe you two should talk.
You have a roommate at this school of yours? I'd never be comfortable without my single room.
You work as a model? So would Jura, if we were law-abiding Mejarians.
You work as a model? Probably what Jura wants deep down.
You go to school with men? Sounds distracting.
You're a student...I dropped out of school. Bad times.
I hope this "high school" of yours is a little less indoctrinating than Mejare's.
You work as a model? So does Jura here. Fire away.
You work as a model? This is your chance, Jura. Make connections.
You go to school with men? Sounds distracting.
You're a student...I dropped out of school. Bad times.
I hope this "high school" of yours is a little less indoctrinating than Mejare's.
So...you go to school with men? Surprised they can sit still long enough.
What's a college? ...What's a community?
Everyone is educated by the state on Mejare...they certainly fed me a lot of stories about Tarak.
This "college" of yours sounds like a school. I dropped out of school...
You look like a military type...though a rather unintimidating one.
I know you military types. You claim to protect, but only when it suits you.
Oh, perfect. A soldier. Try not to kill anyone for fun before the game is over.
You'll have to excuse my dislike of woman soldiers. The ones I know enjoy indoctrinating children and shutting down housing districts.
"Titans," huh? Those Harvest motherships can get pretty big.
So, you report the news? Mejare's news agencies are all state propaganda.
I'm not a fan of the media...my family has had some bad publicity on Mejare.
You're reporting this? The last time I appeared on television, I was a little girl...
I think I appeared on Mejarian television not too far back. We were raiding an armory.
Good to see a woman who shares my fashion sense...though it looks like a tight fit.
You come from the middle of Earth? I didn't know its population lived underground.
You don't look quite human...and it's not just the ears.
You're an..."elf"? You're going to have to explain what that means.
You were trapped...in a computer? I guess we were trapped in the Paksis once...
You live in a...muh-more-puh-guh?
Is this "muh-more-puh-guh" how Earthlings pass the time? You should be working.
So, you're...some sort of "princess"? Not sure I know what that is...
So...does "princess" mean "light dresser"? That would make more than a few of my crewmates princesses.
...Could you explain what a "princess" is? I'm...not from Earth, so I don't know its titles.
Is a "princess" a position of power on Earth? You'd think an authority figure would wear more clothing...
This girl gives me the creeps...
What's with that look in your eyes? Like an animal playing dead...
"Yandere"...must be from some archaic Earth language.
You're looking a little sickly. Did ships from Earth do this to you?
Why is your skin pink? Do you have a medical condition? Earth is no stranger to poisoning populations it doesn't care for...
You're short like Paiway...and you look a little sickly with that skin. Were you poisoned? Did Earth do this to you?
...Are you alright? Your skin...it's pink, and it looks unhealthy. I wouldn't put it past Earth to do this to undesirables...
"Black Canary"? Maybe I should get a professional name...to inspire fear.
"Black Canary"? I've never seen a canary, but I thought they were yellow.
"Black Canary"? I wish Mejare had canaries...
You're from a...muh-more-puh-guh? Use real words.
You're an avatar? As in, not really here? Where are you projecting this from?
This "virtual" business is new to me. Why not just come here for real?
My crewmates and I all have different hair colors...pure black is an interesting choice, if it's intentional.
Genetic engineering on Mejare has resulted in some pretty outlandish hair colors...I don't think I know anyone with pure black hair.
Good to see a woman who can carry herself, apparently. That black hair is imposing...as is your stark outfit.
You work in a team of women? Seems Earth and Mejare aren't that different after all...though no pilot of mine has pure black hair.
My crewmates and I all have different hair colors...we don't base our identities off of that. Although it would seem your outfit is branching out.
Genetic engineering on Mejare has resulted in some pretty outlandish hair colors...say, you look a little different than before.
Good to see a woman who can carry herself, apparently. And is it just me, or did you dress up for this?
You work in a team of women? Well...seems Earth and Mejare aren't that different after all. Besides the outfits.
Something about your outfit seems unusual for you...strange, since I've never met you before.
These "vampires" of yours sound fearsome. The Harvest probably wants blood from somewhere, too...
Vampires suck blood, huh...there's probably an Earth colony for blood out there somewhere.
I wonder what the blood colony's people must look like. Probably blushing all the time.
So, a man helps you fight vampires? I work with a few men...out of necessity.
I dropped out of school...hope it's treating you better than it did me.
I'm told you're a lawyer. I'm assuming that means you work with the law? Mejare's laws are absolute.
You "practice law," correct? Where I come from, laws are handed down...and no one can argue them.
What does a lawyer do, exactly? Mejare doesn't allow women to argue the laws...if we could, men might be considered human.
Mejare doesn't allow legal arguments...and being a pirate, I'm on the wrong side of them. But law is what you work with, correct?
Sorry to be insulting, but you look rather unevenly-proportioned. You should exercise more.
What's with that look you're giving everyone? This is just a game.
I'm trying not to comment on your body...Mejarians tend to be judgmental enough.
Something about you seems off. I'd suggest you relax.
A test subject...that's how Earth sees its colonies.
I see you've got my affinity for words.
Portals sound useful...even faster-than-light still takes a while.
Women shouldn't be afraid to speak their minds.
Hearing you loud and clear.
What are these "video games" you play? Sounds like something Dita would distract herself with instead of attending flight practice.
You go to school with men? They don't seem able to focus for long enough.
You're a student...I'm a dropout. Let's leave it at that.
So you two are classmates? I'd say you're not wearing the same uniform...but that may just be a cultural clash.
Shouldn't schoolmates be wearing identical uniforms? ...Maybe that's just a Mejarian custom.
I see classmates on Earth don't wear identical uniforms. That must be yet another Mejarian indoctrination practice.
I always had to wear a uniform to school on Mejare. If you two are classmates, I guess that's not a requirement on Earth.
...What am I looking at? Are you human? You look like...some sort of robot.
You beep whenever you move. Are you some sort of robot? More advanced than what we have...
Er...what are you, exactly? Is that a mechanical suit, or...are you a machine?
Are you...a machine? Our most advanced robot is Pyoro, since he can talk...you're on another level.
What...does that have to with anything?
...I don't even know what Street Fighter 1 is.
There's an industry for these...things?
I don't know what it was before, so I don't think revolutionizing it would mean much to me...
You look like you're in great shape. I respect that in a woman...very much.
Not to be too forward, but...your legs are so muscular. What's your training routine?
Wow...whatever you do to exercise, I'd like to learn it. You look fantastic.
You're a lot of woman, and in a good way. Could I get your frame with enough training?
Your build is impressive...and I wouldn't say to that to any strange woman.
Oh, perfect...not a few minutes in and these women are already at each other's throats.
Am I intruding on something? Who are you two, and why are you fighting already?
Do you two know each other? Or is it just in Earth women's nature to fight like this?
I'd prefer if we didn't start this friendly card game with a fistfight. I came a long way to Earth just to deal with you two.
You said you were a "Street Fighter," correct? I suppose that would get you into shape.
You said something about street fighting? I've been in street fights. I'd rather not go back to that, but if you like it...
You said you're a street fighter? That's a harsh life...I lived on the streets when I was younger.
Street fighting isn't the kind of thing I'd glorify, but if it makes you happy...just take care of yourself.
You're a "witcher"? A Mejarian judge called Jura a witch...for possession of an anatomy book.
You're a "witcher"? Mejarians who associate with men get called witches...
The word "witch" gets us a little touchy sometimes...I apologize.
You're a "witcher"? What do you think, Jura? Was it for owning an anatomy book?
You're a "witcher"? Mejarians who associate with men get called witches...like us.
The word "witch" gets us a little touchy sometimes...I apologize.
Wh-what's the meaning of this? Why are you lugging an axe around? Disarm yourself!
...Stay away from me. No woman carrying an axe is of sound mind.
Are we supposed to ignore the bloody axe beside you? I should've brought my laser ring...
I knew Earth women were capable of being ruthless killers, but I expected something more subtle than carrying an axe around.
You're a..."princess"?
What's a princess? Some kind of leadership position?
A princess...is that like the Grand Ma?
You're royalty? I don't like it when people assume they're better than others.
I hear there's a male version of you. I'd hate to see the male version of me.
The same person, both male and female...that shreds any doubts I had about men and women being the same species.
I wonder what Hibiki would look like as a woman...probably taller, honestly.
Male and female...you two would make perfect test subjects for Tarakkian scientists.
The same person, one born on Mejare and the other on Tarak.
I'll be honest...you both look like women, and I'm not sure which one is prettier.
Ah, so you two are comrades? I imagine Corrin is the officer, given her more professional look.
Always good to see two strong women working together. Corrin's wearing armor, so I imagine she's your commanding officer.
Is Corrin your commander, Rinkah? You're speaking like she is, and she's more dressed for the part.
It's nice to see that, even on Earth, women fight together. And apparently the officers wear armor there, too...
Good to see someone who shares my fashion sense...on most days.
Bodysuits can get uncomfortable, wouldn't you agree? I hear you normally wear one.
You pilot a mech? So does Hibiki...and he's learning. But he always dresses the same, unlike you.
So, what's planet Korea like? Never heard of it...is this how people dress there?
You're a pilot, too? Mechs, Dreads, they're all fascinating...even though you're not dressed for the part today.
Good to see someone who shares my fashion sense...
These bodysuits can get uncomfortable, wouldn't you agree?
You pilot a mech? So does Hibiki...and he's learning.
So, what's planet Korea like? Never heard of it.
You're a pilot, too? Mechs, Dreads, they're all fascinating.
You're a..."princess"? You look like you're about to cast off that dress and go running.
What's a princess? Some kind of leadership position? You seem more like a dressed-up athlete.
A princess...is that like the Grand Ma? She's certainly not as athletic as you look.
You're royalty? I don't like it when people assume they're better than others...though you might have an athletic edge on me.
So, you solve mysteries...with some men? Men don't seem smart enough for that.
So, you solve mysteries? The Paksis is one big glowing mystery.
I'm told you get captured a lot. Allies are important to have...but a woman should be strong on her own.
You look like you've got my temperament. Did someone elbow you into doing this, too?
You go to school with men? They don't seem able to focus for long enough...and you don't seem happy to be here.
You're a student...I'm a dropout. Let's leave it at that...since you seem annoyed regardless.
You're barely bigger than Paiway. Children aren't allowed here...and you seem miserable about it, anyway.
"Dark Magician Girl"? That's some sort of title, right?
Don't you have some sort of first name? "Dark Magician Girl" is too long to say in the heat of battle.
Dark Magician Girl? Children aren't allowed here.
It's poker, not pokermon.
You train pokuh--what?
These Pokemon sound interesting...Mejare doesn't have many animals.
You capture animals for your own amusement...sounds a little cruel, but Mejare treats men that way.
These Pokemon nipping at your heels sounds like Pyoro when he's making his rounds.
You're a pirate? They certainly dress much differently on Earth...
I'm a pirate, too...small universe we live in.
An Earth pirate? Well...the outfit is certainly different, and apparently the manner.
You're a..."princess"? For nobility, you don't seem too informed...
What's a princess? Some kind of leadership position? Then why are you here?
A princess...is that like the Grand Ma? She'd never lower herself to games like this...
You're royalty? I don't like it when people assume they're better than others...though I suppose you're lowering yourself by playing this.
Even for an Earth woman, that looks like pretty old-fashioned dress. Your manners are similarly classical...
I could have sworn I saw you at another table than this one...guess it must have been a similarly passive woman.
How'd you lose that bit of your finger? You seem rather demure to be in combat...
You don't seem very assertive. I wouldn't think this game would attract a shy woman like you...
This "magic" of yours sounds pretty interesting. Can it be taught?
I'm told you're immortal. Is that in the sense of never aging, or never dying at all?
If you really can wield magic, I'd be honored to learn it...it sounds useful.
The Paksis has proven to me that powers beyond human ability exist...so I'm willing to believe you might have some.
I was told you were a spacefarer, as well...and a pilot. Good to see a woman who understands my situation.
